subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: In Coach Steve Lavin’s return to the bench a month after prostate cancer surgery, St. John’s rallied from a 14-point second-half deficit for a 78-73 victory over visiting Lehigh.
snippet: In Coach Steve Lavin’s return to the bench a month after prostate cancer surgery, St. John’s rallied from a 14-point second-half deficit for a 78-73 victory over visiting Lehigh.
